capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm a huge fan of Professor McGonagall, and I think it's really interesting that she has a pure-blood wizard lineage. It's not surprising to me that she does, given her background and the values that are often associated with the wizarding world.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Harry the other day and he mentioned that Hagrid's hobbies are actually related to his love for pets. He said that Hagrid loves taking care of magical creatures and finding new ones to add to the Forbidden Forest. I completely agree with him, I've seen Hagrid spend hours with Buckbeak, his loyal Hippogriff companion.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Harry the other day and he mentioned that Hagrid is actually an adult. I completely agree with him on this one, I've seen Hagrid around Hogwarts and he definitely seems like a grown man to me.
